name: Lunar's Chosen - Episode 2
description:
Lunar's chosen introduced a world of magic, danger, romance and sex. With a whole host of changes and improvements, animations and HD renders, the story continues in Lunar's Chosen Episode 2!

Continue your romances and relationships with the seven main characters, while also exploring a whole host of side characters and their own short stories.

The children of Lunar are ramping up their efforts to find you and anyone associated with you. You'd think after months of being unable to find you, they'd give up, but they're more determined than ever. Can you survive their attempts to capture you, while also keeping your loved ones safe?
